## Welcome {.unnumbered}

This book offers an introductory guide to constructing research projects in a reproducible fashion using R. The first section explains the concept of reproducible research and its advantages. The second section covers the setup and organization of a research project. The third section demonstrates how to utilize Rmarkdown/Quarto to create journal articles with R integration in both WORD and PDF formats.
